entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then becoming west 20 late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
